meanings.def: concerning or characterized by an appreciation of beauty or good taste
meanings.example: I find that my aesthetic faculties get stronger every time I visit a museum.

meanings.def: a philosophical theory attempting to explain and understand what is beautiful and why it might be considered that way
a typographic mark used to represent 'and'
meanings.example: The name of the firm was usually written with an ampersand.

meanings.def: a metric unit of length equal to one ten billionth of a meter
meanings.example: The scientists told us that the measurement was accurate to 3 angstroms.

meanings.def: a typographic symbol used to draw the reader's attention
meanings.example: The typesetter preferred manicules to changes of font when emphasizing small notes in the text.
